text:
The duly appointed and acting head of the respective department for which a revolving fund has been provided shall be responsible for the full amount of the revolving fund for his or her department. 
(Added by Ord. 17-62, App. 1/17/62; amended by Ord. 298-97, App. 7/25/97)

heading.catch_text: CASH REVOLVING FUNDS – RESPONSIBLITY FOR AMOUNT OF FUNDS.
